message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $9,800 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? It's a fair price that reflects the value of the product.
I understand that you want to make a profit, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $9,900?
